ygData.subject: Re:Equipment Questions -- Please Help
ygData.msgSnippet: what are the stats on the werewolf skin cloak? 2)gator scale leggings are better - more ac.  Dex (as we discussed earlier) does nothing for us monks so put
ygData.messageBody:
what are the stats on the werewolf skin cloak?

2)gator scale leggings are better - more ac. Dex (as we discussed earlier) does
nothing for us monks so put those drakes in the bank (if there is ever a procing
glove introduced then break em back out again!)
and camp the ancient croc for some gator leggs - which are the rare drop. But
you can earn afew thousand pp while you wait for em (and MONDO xp besides)
killing the crocs and selling the one or two gator sleeves you will likely earn
while you wait for your legs to drop. At level 28 you could probably solo the
spawn but i would bring a caster friend (int based caster so he wont compete for
the legs) along just to be safe.

3)get lupine gauntlets (4 ac, 3dex 3 agi) or if you can treant fists ( 8ac 3dex
- hell of long quest for these: one of the spawns is a once a week spawn!)


All in all great Equipment for your level. Long term things to shoot for would
be cloak of shadows and haste sash. Personally I use the crown of froglock
kings over the exe hood (which I keep in the bank) 12 is too good to pass up for
4 str and 9 meaningless dex. The crown is also a greater light source so it
can replace the wu's in that respect.

My equipment is:
ears: diamodine earings
face: Lizardskin Tribal mask
neck: golden Black pearl choker (I will be switching to the gold opal soon)
head: Crown of froglock kingsb (12 ac, 20 fire, 20 cold resist)
fingers: jaggeds
wrist: serp bracer/errolisi bracer (one of each)
arms: aszure
shoulders: cured silk
chest: cured silk
back: white wolf hide cloak (7ac, 3 str 3 dex I think... is the werewolf cloak
better? never seen it)
hands: treant fists (left my lupines in the bank)
legs: gatorscale
waist: haste sash
feet: wolf fur


____________________Reply Separator____________________
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Equipment Questions -- Please Help
Author: Worlord <worlord99@...>
Date: 01/23/2000 1:48 PM

From: Worlord <worlord99@...>

I am a level 28 monk, here is my equipment

ear: electrum sapphire
face: lizardskin tribal
neck: gold opal
head: exe hood
fingers: jagged bands
wrist: serp bracers
arms: azure sleeves
hands: wu's
shoulders: cured silk
chest: foremans
back: werewolf skin cloak
waist: Thick leather
legs: drake-hide
feet: wolf-fur

I have about 1000pp in bank . I also have 2 obsidian
bead hoops I am not using, here are my stats.

107str
92sta
131agi

What are some advancements I can make? I know I need
diamondine earrings. Anything else?

Thanks =)

Hammeron Stonespirit
28 Monk of Quellious
"Can't tell if he has haste or not"
